Ever since the Pan India releases have initiated from Tollywood and all around, there has been a dialogue about who is the Pan Indian celebrity. With the advance reservations of Adipurush, Prabhas is proving that he is truly the biggest star of Tollywood and nobody is near to him. The movie is set to launch with more than 130 Crores Gross on the debut day, which will be the all-time Top 4 opening. Image source: https://www.businesstoday.in


The tickets are selling like hot cakes and if the movie receives positive word of mouth then the sky will be the boundary for the film at the box office. Also, the film will turn into a game changer for Prabhas. A star hero needs to show his box office strengths to be labeled as a pan-Indian star or a global celebrity, and Prabhas is correctly proving that with the advance bookings of Adipurush. 



Rajesh Nair, Prasad Sutar, Om Raut, Bhushan Kumar and Krishan Kumar of Retrophiles. People Media Factory is presenting the movie to the Telugu audience. In particular, tracks like Jai Shri Ram and Ram Siya Ram have been able to raise the film to a higher level of respect instead of being a movie that people originally perceived without giving it a fair chance.

Directed by Om Raut, ‘Adipurush’ features Prabhas as Lord Ram, Kriti Sanon as Janaki, and Saif Ali Khan as Raavan, Sunny Singh as Lakshman, and Deva Dutta Nage as Lord Hanuman. post.title: Nayanthara House Address: Inside Images, Net Worth & More
post.text:
Introduction:



Nayanthara often hailed as the “Lady Superstar” of the South Indian film industry, and her husband, the renowned director Vignesh Shivan, are one of the most adored couples in Indian cinema. Their love story, culminating in a grand wedding on June 9, 2022, in Mahabalipuram, has captivated fans and followers. The couple, who welcomed twin sons Uyir (Rudronil N Shivan) and Ulag (Daivag N Shivan) last year through surrogacy, have built a life together filled with love, luxury, and privacy. Nayanthara House In Chennai’s  







 Nayanthara House Address:



In 2021, Nayanthara and Vignesh Shivan purchased a four-bedroom flat in Chennai’s prestigious Poes Garden. This area is known for being one of the city’s most affluent neighborhoods, often compared to the luxury of Mumbai’s Pali Hill or Delhi’s Lutyens Zone. According to sources, Nayanthara made a substantial investment in this opulent home, which stands as a testament to her success and stature in the film industry. 











Rumors also suggest that the “Jawan” actress has acquired additional properties in Chennai, including two more homes. In addition to her Chennai properties, Nayanthara House is in Hyderabad Banjara Hills. Despite their fame and the public’s interest in their lives, Nayanthara and Vignesh are known for keeping their personal affairs private. They rarely share details about their residences, but the glimpses they do provide on social media reveal a home that is both expansive and elegantly furnished. 







Nayanthara House:



Their Poes Garden residence is a sprawling 16,500 square feet, featuring state-of-the-art amenities that reflect the couple’s taste for luxury. Among the highlights of their home are a private swimming pool, a fully equipped home theatre, and a functional gym. The bathroom alone spans an impressive 1,500 square feet, underscoring the scale and opulence of the property. 







The Opulent Terrace



The terrace of their home is an inviting space designed for relaxation and outdoor entertaining. It features a sizable round sun mica table paired with coral metal patio chairs, creating an ideal setting for elegant dinners under the open sky. The couple frequently enjoys this outdoor space, as seen in various social media posts. 







Hall and Children’s Room



Nayanthara House is designed to be both stylish and family-friendly. The children’s room is a cozy, welcoming space with two infant beds placed side by side. The ceiling panels are painted with English alphabets, adding a playful touch, while a sleek black split AC ensures comfort. The living area is equally inviting, with comfortable couches, an opulent chandelier that illuminates the room, and horizontal blinds that add a modern flair. 







Also Read:  Nagarjuna House Address: Inside Images, Net Worth & More 











Personalized Touches



The living room features a unique and charming detail: personalized initials “W” for Wiki (Vignesh Shivan) and “N” for Nayanthara are prominently displayed on the walls. This personalization adds a warm and intimate touch to the lavish space, making it distinctly theirs. 



The Grand Hall











The hall of their home is a testament to cutting-edge decor and luxurious living. Bright, colorful flowers infuse the space with natural beauty and vibrancy, while wishbone branch and twig ceiling lights cast an elegant glow. The decor is both sophisticated and welcoming, making it a perfect space for entertaining guests. 



A Love for Nature











Nayanthara has a well-known affection for nature, which is reflected in the lush garden that surrounds their home. This serene retreat is filled with luxuriant vegetation, offering a tranquil space for the family to relax and connect with nature. A cozy basket chair in the garden beckons, providing the perfect spot to unwind. In a touching Instagram post, Nayanthara is seen sharing a sweet moment with her baby son Uyir in this peaceful garden setting. 







Also Read: Victory Venkatesh House Address: Inside Images, Net Worth & More 











Nayanthara Movie Collaborations:



Nagarjuna and Nayanthara have shared the screen in two successful films: 



Boss I Love You: This romantic comedy was a commercial hit, showcasing the pair’s chemistry and comic timing. 



Greeku Veerudu: Another romantic comedy, this film further solidified their on-screen partnership. 



Their first collaboration was in the 2019 film “Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy,” a historical action drama. Chiranjeevi played the titular role of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, a freedom fighter, while Nayanthara portrayed Siddhamma, his loyal wife. The film was praised for its grand scale, powerful performances, and gripping narrative, with both actors receiving accolades for their roles. 



Their latest collaboration is in the 2023 film “Godfather,” a political action thriller. In this film, Chiranjeevi plays the lead role of Brahma, while Nayanthara takes on the pivotal role of Sathyapriya Jaidev. The film has been well-received for its intense storyline and the dynamic performances of the lead actors.

post.title: Indian celebrity photographer Rohan Shrestha shoots 'nice, funny' Ryan Reynolds
post.text: Renowned celebrity photographer Rohan Shrestha recently completed an exclusive photoshoot with Hollywood star Ryan Reynolds. This is not the first time Shrestha has clicked pictures of global head-turners, including names such as Lionel Messi, Kevin Hart and Oprah Winfrey. The photographer, who has worked with Bollywood bigwigs such as Shah Rukh Khan, Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Priyanka Chopra and Indian cricket superstar Virat Kohli, 'White T Series' features celebrities in simple white T-Shirts, has become particularly iconic, capturing the essence of stars like Oprah Winfrey with striking simplicity. The series began in 2012 with actor Abhay Deol, reports variety.com. For Reynolds' shoot, Shrestha implemented his signature style, creating a series of black and white portraits. The photographer shared an anecdote about bonding with the star over his early role in "Two Guys, a Girl and a Pizza Place". "The first thing I spoke to him about was a show that he was a part of when he was much younger," Shrestha said. "I told him about his character Berg and how I used to watch that growing up in India. He laughed and said, 'Oh, that's awesome, man, that's still one of my most favorite roles that I've played.'" Shrestha added that Reynolds is "genuinely nice and funny". He added: "He made everybody on the crew laugh. For me personally, I was kind of nervous just because it's always nervy to shoot someone you're in awe of."

post.title: Salman Khan: Bollywood's Real-Life Hero
post.text: Beyond the glitz and glamour of Bollywood, Salman Khan has shown a compassionate side.  Years ago, he made a life-saving decision when he donated his bone marrow to a young girl in dire need.  This selfless act marked a turning point, not just for the child but for the nation.  Salman's courage to step forward and become the first Indian celebrity bone marrow donor encouraged others to consider this life-saving gesture.  His empathy didn't stop there. Salman has been a vocal advocate for bone marrow donation, urging people to overcome their fears and contribute to saving lives.    His influence has undoubtedly inspired countless individuals to become donors.   While often in the spotlight for different reasons, this humanitarian aspect of Salman Khan's personality shines brightly, reminding us of the power of kindness and compassion.   Here are some lessons we can learn from Salman Khan's act of kindness:   Selfless acts of kindness can have a profound impact. Salman Khan's decision to donate his bone marrow not only saved a young girl's life, but it also helped to raise awareness about bone marrow donation in India.    His act of generosity inspired others to come forward and donate, which could potentially save many more lives.    Overcoming fear can lead to positive change. Many people are afraid of donating bone marrow because they believe it is a painful procedure.    However, Salman Khan's willingness to donate despite his own fears helped to dispel this myth.    By speaking out about his experience, he encouraged others to overcome their fears and consider donating.    Using one's influence to promote a cause can be highly effective. Salman Khan is one of the most famous actors in India.    By using his platform to raise awareness about bone marrow donation, he was able to reach a large audience and make a significant impact.    His advocacy helped to increase the number of people who registered as bone marrow donors in India.

post.title: Shah Rukh Khan becomes the first Indian actor to receive a customized gold coin from a Paris museum
post.text:
The Grévin wax museum in Paris has honored Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan with a customized gold coin inscribed with his name. This accolade recognizes Khan’s significant contributions to world cinema. The museum, which already features a wax statue of Khan, added this honor as a special tribute. Other Bollywood celebrities, such as Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Ranveer Singh, have also been celebrated by the museum, but Khan is reportedly the first Indian celebrity to receive this specific honor.

At 58, Shah Rukh Khan made a triumphant return to the big screen in 2023 after a five-year hiatus, starring in three major releases: Pathaan, Jawan, and Dunki. Both Pathaan and Jawan were blockbuster hits. Khan also made a cameo appearance in the film Tiger 3. Looking ahead, he is set to star in an action film titled King, which will also feature his daughter, Suhana Khan, and actor Abhishek Bachchan.

post.title: Ram Charan becomes first Indian celebrity to be awarded the Ambassador for Indian Art & Culture at IIFM
post.text: The Indian Film Festival of Melbourne (IFFM) is thrilled to announce Global Star, Ram Charan, as the Guest of Honour for its 15th edition. Photo courtesy Ram team Ram Charan, who has carved a niche in the Indian film industry and captivated pan-Indian audiences with his multitude of blockbusters. He will add his star power to this prestigious annual celebration of Indian cinema down under. IFFM is the official film festival hosted by the Victorian State Government annually. He will take place this year from 15-25 August 2024. Ram Charan’s magnum opus film RRR, not only shattered box office records. But also brought immense pride to India by winning the Oscar for Best Original Song “Naatu Naatu”. This along with his many other achievement highlights Ram Charan’s significant impact on Indian cinema and his widespread global recognition. Born into a legendary film family, Ram Charan is the son of Mega Star Chiranjeevi. His contributions to Indian cinema have been nothing short of extraordinary. His presence at IFFM will be a tandem to highlight his incredible glory and immense contribution to Indian cinema at large. In addition to being the guest of honour. He will also be awarded the Ambassador for Indian Art and Culture for his stellar contributions to Indian cinema. The festival, as an honor to him, will also be hosting a retrospective of his iconic films. Thus celebrating his remarkable journey in the film industry. Expressing his excitement about attending the festival, Ram Charan said, “I am deeply honored to be a part of the Indian Film Festival of Melbourne that celebrates the diversity and richness of Indian cinema on an international platform. It’s a privilege to represent our film industry and connect with fans and cinephiles from across the globe. The success of RRR and the love it received worldwide has been overwhelming, and I am thrilled to share this moment with the audience in Melbourne. I look forward to this tremendous opportunity to hoist our national flag here in Melbourne.” Mitu Bhowmick Lange, Festival Director of IFFM, remarked, “Ram Charan’s presence at the 15th edition of IFFM adds an extra layer of excitement and prestige. His work in RRR has not only set new benchmarks but also solidified his place as one of the most influential actors in Indian cinema today. We are delighted to welcome him to Melbourne and look forward to celebrating his achievements with audiences at the festival.” The 15th edition of the Indian Film Festival of Melbourne promises to be an unforgettable event. With Ram Charan’s presence adding to the excitement and grandeur. The festival is slated to celebrate its landmark 15th year with much glory with films from across India and the Indian subcontinent. IFFM is a multi-award-winning film festival that is the largest celebration of Indian Cinema in the Southern Hemisphere. On the work front, Ram Charan is all set to dive into his next projects Game Changer with Kiara Advani. Also, RC16 with Janhvi Kapoor and RC17 directed by Pushpa director Sukumar. post.author: Usman Zaka
post.title: Prince Narula and the Digital Revolution with PayPal
post.text:
In the ever-evolving landscape of digital finance, certain individuals and innovations stand out for their transformative impact. One such figure is Prince Narula, a popular Indian celebrity known for his multifaceted career in reality TV and entertainment. Prince Narula’s endorsement and use of PayPal highlight the growing trend of digital payment systems, which are reshaping how we handle transactions in our daily lives. This blog post explores the intersection of Prince Narula’s influence and the digital payment giant, PayPal, delving into how this combination is driving change in the financial world. 



Who is Prince Narula? 



Prince Narula is a well-known name in India, especially in the entertainment industry. He first gained fame as a contestant on various reality TV shows. His journey to stardom began with winning the title of ‘Mr. Punjab’ in 2014. He then went on to win several popular reality TV shows such as ‘MTV Roadies,’ ‘MTV Splitsvilla,’ and ‘Bigg Boss,’ making him a household name. His charming personality, competitive spirit, and strong fan following have made him a significant influencer in India. 



Career Highlights 




Mr. Punjab 2014: His initial claim to fame.



MTV Roadies X2 (2015): Winner, showcasing his physical and mental prowess.



MTV Splitsvilla 8 (2015): Winner, further cementing his popularity.



Bigg Boss 9 (2015-2016): Winner, broadening his appeal across India.



Nach Baliye 9 (2019): Winner alongside his wife, Yuvika Chaudhary.




The Rise of Digital Payments 



The digital revolution has significantly altered the financial landscape globally. In India, the push towards digital payments has been accelerated by government initiatives such as the demonetization drive in 2016 and the promotion of the Digital India campaign. Digital wallets, online banking, and mobile payment platforms have become integral to the way people handle money. 



Why Digital Payments? 




Convenience: Transactions can be made anytime, anywhere.



Security: Enhanced security measures protect against fraud.



Speed: Instantaneous transactions save time.



Accessibility: Easy access to financial services for people in remote areas.




PayPal: A Leader in Digital Payments 



PayPal is a global leader in the digital payments industry, offering services that enable consumers and businesses to send and receive money online. Founded in 1998, PayPal has grown to become one of the most widely used payment platforms worldwide, known for its user-friendly interface and robust security features. 



Key Features of PayPal 




Ease of Use: Simple and intuitive interface.



Global Reach: Available in over 200 countries and supports multiple currencies.



Security: Advanced encryption and fraud detection mechanisms.



Versatility: Supports a wide range of transactions, from shopping to bill payments.




Prince Narula’s Association with PayPal 



Prince Narula’s association with PayPal brings together the worlds of entertainment and digital finance. As a popular figure, his endorsement of PayPal helps to increase awareness and adoption of digital payment methods among his extensive fan base. 



How Prince Narula Uses PayPal 




Shopping: Prince often shares his shopping experiences using PayPal, highlighting the convenience and security it offers.



Business Transactions: As an entrepreneur, Prince uses PayPal for various business-related transactions, emphasizing its reliability.



Charity: He also utilizes PayPal for charitable donations, showcasing its ease of use for supporting good causes.




Impact on Fans and Followers 



Prince Narula’s endorsement of PayPal has a significant influence on his fans and followers. His active promotion of digital payments encourages his audience to embrace these technologies, contributing to the broader adoption of digital finance in India. 



Encouraging Digital Literacy 



By sharing his positive experiences with PayPal, Prince Narula helps demystify digital payments for his followers. This, in turn, promotes digital literacy, making people more comfortable and confident in using online financial services. 



The Future of Digital Payments 



The partnership between influencers like Prince Narula and digital payment platforms like PayPal represents a promising future for digital finance. As more people become familiar with and trust these technologies, the digital economy will continue to grow. 



Innovations on the Horizon 




Blockchain Technology: Enhancing security and transparency.



AI and Machine Learning: Improving fraud detection and customer service.



Integration with Social Media: Making digital payments more accessible through platforms people already use daily.




Embracing the Digital Future 



In a world that is increasingly digital, the importance of staying informed and adaptable cannot be overstated. Whether you’re a fan of Prince Narula or simply interested in the future of finance, understanding and utilizing digital payment platforms like PayPal can significantly enhance your financial experience. So, take a cue from Prince and explore the convenience and security of digital payments today. 



Conclusion 



Prince Narula’s association with PayPal is a testament to the transformative power of digital payments. By leveraging his influence, Prince helps to promote the advantages of digital finance, encouraging more people to embrace these modern technologies. As the digital landscape continues to evolve, the collaboration between influential personalities and fintech companies will play a crucial role in shaping the future of financial transactions.

IFFM అనేది ఆస్ట్రేలియాలోని విక్టోరియన్ రాష్ట్ర ప్రభుత్వం ఏటా నిర్వహించే అధికారిక చలనచిత్రోత్సవం. ఈ వేడుక‌లు 15-25 ఆగస్టు 2024 వరకు జరగ‌నున్నాయి.  https://x.com/IFFMelb/status/1814175822384672917 రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్ న‌టించిన RRR చిత్రం బాక్సాఫీస్ ద‌గ్గ‌ర స‌రికొత్త రికార్డుల‌ను సృష్టించ‌ట‌మే కాదు, అందులోని ‘నాటు నాటు..’ పాట‌కు ఆస్కార్ అవార్డును సొంతం చేసుకుంది. ఇది ఇండియ‌న్ సినిమాకు ఎంతో గ‌ర్వ కార‌ణంగా నిలిచింది. ఇది రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్‌కు విజ‌యాన్ని అందించ‌టంతో పాటు భార‌తీయ సినిమాపై తిరుగులేని ప్ర‌భావాన్ని చూపించింది. అలాగే రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్‌కు ప్ర‌పంచ వ్యాప్తంగా మంచి గుర్తింపు ద‌క్కింది.  ఇండియ‌న్ సినిమాల్లో లెజెండ్రీ న‌టుడైన చిరంజీవి త‌న‌యుడిగా రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్ ఇప్పుడు త‌న‌దైన ముద్ర వేశారు. ఆయ‌న ఇండియ‌న్ సినిమాకు చేసిన కృషి అసాధార‌ణ‌మైన‌ది. అలాంటి న‌టుడు IFFMలో పాల్గొన‌టం అనేది ఆయ‌న‌కు మ‌రింత గుర్తింపును తెచ్చి పెట్ట‌ట‌మే కాదు ఇండియ‌న సినిమాకు చేసిన స‌పోర్ట్‌కు మ‌రో మెట్టుకు ఎక్కించేలా ఉంది.  ఈ  IFFM వేడుక‌ల్లో గౌర‌వ అతిథిగా ఉండ‌టంతో పాటు.. ఇండియ‌న్ సినిమాకు ఆయ‌న చేసిన సేవ‌కుగానూ ఇండియ‌న్ ఆర్ట్ అండ్ కల్చ‌ర్ అంబాసిడర్‌గా అందుకోనున్నారు. ఈ ఫెస్టివ‌ల్‌లో చ‌ర‌ణ్ పాల్గొన‌టం అనేది ఆయ‌న గౌర‌వాన్ని మ‌రింత‌గా పెంపొందిస్తోంది. త‌ద్వారా చ‌ల‌న చిత్ర ప‌రిశ్ర‌మలో త‌న అద్భుత‌మైన ప్ర‌యాణాన్ని ఇది తెలియ‌చేస్తుంది.   ఈ సంద‌ర్భంగా రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్ స్పందిస్తూ.. ‘‘మ‌న భార‌తీయ చిత్రాల్లోని వైవిధ్యాన్ని, గొప్ప‌దనాన్ని ఇలాంటి ఓ అంత‌ర్జాతీయ వేదిక‌గా ఘ‌నంగా నిర్వ‌హిస్తుండ‌టం ఆనందంగా ఉంది. అలాంటి ఇండియ‌న్ ఫిల్మ్ ఫెస్టివ‌ల్ ఆఫ్ మెల్‌బోర్న్‌లో భాగం కావ‌టం అనేది నాకు ద‌క్కిన గౌర‌వంగా భావిస్తున్నాను. ఈ వేదిక‌పై మ‌న చిత్ర ప‌రిశ్ర‌మ త‌ర‌పున నేను ప్రాతినిద్యం వ‌హించ‌టం ఆనందంగా ఉంది. అలాగే ప్ర‌పంచ వ్యాప్తంగా ఉన్న అభిమానులు, సినీ ప్ర‌ముఖుల‌తో క‌నెక్ట్ కావ‌టం అనేది మ‌రింత ఉత్సాహాన్ని క‌లిగిస్తోంది. ట్రిపులార్ సినిమా ప్రపంచ వ్యాప్తంగా ఎలాంటి విజ‌యాన్ని ద‌క్కించుకుందో అంద‌రికీ తెలుసు. ఆ సినిమాను ఆద‌రించిన తీరు గురించి ఎంత చెప్పినా త‌క్కువే. మెల్‌బోర్న్‌లో ఆ సినిమాకు సంబంధించిన క్ష‌ణాల‌ను ప్రేక్ష‌కుల‌తో పంచుకోవ‌టం నాకు మాట‌ల్లో చెప్ప‌లేని సంతోషాన్ని క‌లిగిస్తోంది. మెల్‌బోర్న్‌లో మ‌న జాతీయ జెండాను ఎగుర‌వేసే అద్భుత‌మైన అవ‌కాశం కోసం నేను ఎదురు చూస్తున్నాను’’ అన్నారు.  IFFM డైరెక్టర్ మితు బౌమిక్ లాంగ్ మాట్లాడుతూ ‘‘IFFM 15 ఎడిషన్ సినీ వేడుకల్లో రామ్ చరణ్ పాల్గొనబోతుండటం అందరిలో ఆస‌క్తిని పెంచ‌టంతో పాటు మాకెంతో గౌర‌వంగా ఉంది. ఆర్ఆర్ఆర్ సినిమాలో న‌టుడిగా ఆయ‌న క్రియేట్ చేసిన బెంచ్ మార్క్ ఇండియ‌న్ సినిమాలో ప్ర‌భావంతమైన న‌టుల్లో ఒక‌రిగా నిల‌బెట్టింది. ఆయ‌న్ని మెల్‌బోర్న్‌కు సాద‌రంగా స్వాగతించ‌టానికి ఉత్సాహంగా ఎదురు చూస్తున్నాం. అలాగే ఆయ‌న విజ‌యాల‌ను ఇక్క‌డ మ‌రింత ఘ‌నంగా జ‌రుపుకోబోతున్నాం’’ అన్నారు.  ఇండియ‌న్ ఫిల్మ్ ఫెస్టివ‌ల్ ఆఫ్ మెల్‌బోర్న్ 15వ ఎడిష‌న్‌లో రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్ పాల్గొన‌బోతుండ‌టం అంద‌రిలోనూ ఆస‌క్తిని పెంచుతోంది. అలాగే అంద‌రికీ మ‌ర‌చిపోలేని అనుభూతిని క‌లిగిస్తుంద‌ని క‌మిటీ తెలియ‌జేసింది. ఈ 15వ ఎడిష‌ను  చాలా వైభ‌వంగా ఓ మైలురాయిలా నిల‌చిపోయేటట్లు సెల‌బ్రేట్ చేయ‌టానికి స‌న్నాహాలు చేస్తున్నారు. సద‌ర‌న్ హెమీస్పియ‌ర్‌లో జ‌రిగే అతి పెద్ద ఫిల్మ్ ఫెస్టివ‌ల్స్‌లో  IFFM ఒక‌టి.  రీసెంట్‌గా ‘గేమ్ ఛేంజర్’ సినిమా షూటింగ్‌ను రామ్ చ‌ర‌ణ్ పూర్తి చేశారు. శంకర్ తెర‌కెక్కిస్తోన్న ఈ సినిమాలో కియారా అద్వానీ క‌థానాయిక‌. త్వ‌ర‌లోనే RC16ను ప్రారంభించ‌నున్నారు. ఇందులో జాన్వీ క‌పూర్ హీరోయిన్‌. అలాగే RC17  సుకుమార్ ద‌ర్శ‌క‌త్వంలో తెర‌కెక్క‌నుంది.

post.title: Ram Charan Becomes First Indian Celebrity to be Feted as Ambassador for Indian Art & Culture at…
post.text: Ram Charan Becomes First Indian Celebrity to be Feted as Ambassador for Indian Art & Culture at the Indian Film Festival of MelbourneThe Indian Film Festival of Melbourne (IFFM) has chosen actor Ram Charan as the Guest of Honour for its 15th edition. Ram Charan, who has carved a niche in the Indian film industry and captivated pan-Indian audiences with his multitude of blockbusters, will add his star power to this prestigious annual celebration of Indian cinema down under. IFFM is the official film festival hosted by the Victorian State Government annually and will take place this year from 15-25 August 2024. Ram CharanRam Charan’s magnum opus film RRR, not only shattered box- office records but also brought immense pride to India by winning the Oscar for Best Original Song Naatu Naatu. This along with his many other achievement highlights Ram Charan’s significant impact on Indian cinema and his widespread global recognition. Born into a legendary film family, Ram Charan is the son of megastar Chiranjeevi. His contributions to Indian cinema have been nothing short of extraordinary, and his presence at IFFM will be a tandem to highlight his incredible glory and immense contribution to Indian cinema at large. In addition to being the guest of honour, he will also be awarded the Ambassador for Indian Art and Culture for his stellar contributions to Indian cinema. The festival, as an honour to him, will also be hosting a retrospective of his iconic films thus celebrating his remarkable journey in the film industry. Expressing his excitement about attending the festival, Ram Charan said, "I am deeply honoured to be a part of the Indian Film Festival of Melbourne that celebrates the diversity and richness of Indian cinema on an international platform. It’s a privilege to represent our film industry and connect with fans and cinephiles from across the globe. The success of RRR and the love it received worldwide has been overwhelming, and I am thrilled to share this moment with the audience in Melbourne. I look forward to this tremendous opportunity to hoist our national flag here in Melbourne.” Mitu Bhowmick Lange, Festival Director of IFFM, remarked, "Ram Charan’s presence at the 15th edition of IFFM adds an extra layer of excitement and prestige. His work in RRR has not only set new benchmarks but also solidified his place as one of the most influential actors in Indian cinema today. We are delighted to welcome him to Melbourne and look forward to celebrating his achievements with audiences at the festival." The 15th edition of the Indian Film Festival of Melbourne promises to be an unforgettable event, with Ram Charan’s presence adding to the excitement and grandeur. The festival is slated to celebrate its landmark 15th year with much glory with films from across India and the Indian subcontinent. IFFM is a multi-award-winning film festival that is the largest celebration of Indian Cinema in the Southern Hemisphere. On the work front, Ram Charan is all set to dive into his next projects Game Changer with Kiara Advani, RC16 with Janhvi Kapoor and RC17 directed by Pushpa director Sukumar.

post.author: Ziya Khan
post.title: Urvashi Rautela’s Private Bathroom Video Nearly Topless Wearing a ‘Mangalsutra’ Sparks Publicity Stunt Accusations
post.text:
The release of a private video featuring Urvashi Rautela has caused a major uproar, capturing the attention of the internet. The video depicts the actress in her bathroom, seemingly preparing to take a shower. Initially, many speculated that it might be a random clip from one of her old movies, but it has been revealed that this is not the case. The authenticity of the video, whether it is real or created using AI or deepfake technology, is still being investigated.



  










View this post on Instagram






















  
A post shared by Bollywoodflash (@bollywoodflash01) 


 

Unfortunately, Urvashi Rautela is not the only Indian celebrity to have been targeted by such incidents. Other stars like Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Alia Bhatt, Kajol, Katrina Kaif, and Rashmika Mandanna have also faced similar situations, with explicit images/videos going viral online. The industry is grappling with the challenge of determining the authenticity of these content leaks.The controversial video showcases Urvashi Rautela entering a bathroom while dressed in an orange kurta. What has caught people’s attention is the neckpiece she is wearing, resembling a ‘mangal sutra.’ She proceeds to hang her towel and admires herself in the mirror before undressing. The video ends before anything explicit is shown.

The accidental exposure of this video has sent shockwaves throughout the industry, sparking intense debates about its authenticity and whether Urvashi Rautela may have orchestrated a publicity stunt. Some social media users criticized the actress, accusing her of resorting to cheap stunts or suggesting that she should try different methods to gain attention. While many have shared their opinions on the matter, Urvashi Rautela herself has yet to address the controversy. As the industry and fans await her response, it remains to be seen how this incident will impact her career and public image.On the professional front, Urvashi Rautela was last seen in the political drama Jahangir National University, where she starred alongside Siddharth Bodke in the lead role.

post.title: Nita Ambani was the ‘CEO’ behind the wedding that drew global A-listers to Mumbai over the weekend, daughter-in-law says
post.text:
Anant Ambani’s wife says mother-in-law Nita Ambani was the “CEO” responsible for planning the star-studded wedding bash. 
Prodip Guha/Getty Images 
Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant got married in a star-studded ceremony in Mumbai over the weekend.Merchant credited her mother-in-law, Nita Ambani, for planning the festivities.It takes a whole crew of professionals to pull off a large-scale Indian wedding, experts say. 
Anant Ambani — the son of Asia’s richest man, Mukesh Ambani — married Radhika Merchant over the weekend. The newlyweds have heaped praise on Nita Ambani, the groom’s mother, for the way the festivities turned out. 
“My mother-in-law was the C.E.O. of the wedding, as I like to say,” Merchant told Vogue in an exclusive interview. “It was Nita’s commitment and vision that brought our entire celebration to life.” 
Nita Ambani oversaw the planning of the wedding festivities alongside her daughter, Isha Ambani, and her daughter-in-law, Shloka Ambani, Merchant said. 
In addition to their in-house staff, the Ambanis also engaged the help of event planners to pull off the celebrations, per Vogue. The festivities took place over multiple weeks and culminated in a three-day wedding ceremony in Mumbai over the weekend. 
The couple kicked off the festivities with a pre-wedding party in March, which featured some 1,200 guests, including business leaders like Mark Zuckerberg and Bill Gates. 
During a speech at the pre-wedding bash, Anant thanked his mother for working tirelessly over months to make the party happen. 
“All this is created by my mother and no one else, and my mother has gone all out for the last four months,” Anant can be heard saying in a video of the speech uploaded in March. “She’s worked for, I think, 18, 19 hours a day, and I’m extremely grateful to Mama. Thank you so much.” 
Ambani’s pre-wedding parties included performances from Justin Bieber and Rihanna, among other celebrities. 
Shadows, chefs, technicians: The staff behind a massive wedding
While the newlyweds have been generous in their praise of Nita’s work for the wedding, it takes a massive crew of professionals to pull off such an event. A multi-day Indian celebrity wedding can require around 500 staff, wedding planners previously told Business Insider. 
In addition to chefs, waiters, decorators, and technicians, each main family member may also be assigned a personal butler, or “shadow,” during the wedding to manage their needs, from holding their phones to ensuring hydration, the wedding planners said. Top security firms and local authorities may even be engaged to protect high-profile guests. 
The planners BI spoke to said a typical three-day wedding that they plan costs about $1.2 million. A spokesperson for the Ambanis did not respond to a request for comment about the costs for Anant’s wedding, which was hosted at the Ambani-owned Jio World Convention Centre. 
The wedding festivities sparked some controversy over the weekend due to disruptions caused by traffic diversions and road closures. Nevertheless, the planners BI spoke to expect the scale of the wedding to leave a global impact on the wedding-planning industry. 
“Given the immense influence celebrities have, their weddings often become blueprints for future celebrations worldwide,” Bharat Jagasia, a Delhi-based wedding planner, told BI. 
Read the original article on Business Insider

post.title: Bollywood Actress Aishwarya Rai Selfie with Kim Kardashian
post.text:
Kim Kardashian’s Selfie with Aishwarya Rai Shatters the Internet: A Tribute to the Bollywood ‘Queen’



A photo of reality TV star Kim Kardashian alongside Bollywood icon Aishwarya Rai at Anant Ambani’s Shubh Aashirwad ceremony has taken the internet by storm. 



The Viral Moment: Kim Kardashian and Aishwarya Rai’s Selfie



Kim Kardashian shared a series of images on her Instagram Stories from the Shubh Aashirwad ceremony, which celebrated the newlyweds, Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant. Among these snapshots, the one that captured everyone’s attention was a selfie with the legendary Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai. 



For this grand occasion, Kim donned a custom-made, intricately embroidered dusty rose sheer saree. Aishwarya Rai complemented her in a stunning embroidered black ensemble. Kim captioned their selfie with a single word: “Queen,” tagging Aishwarya in the post. She also shared numerous photos highlighting the event’s elaborate decorations. 



Fan Reactions: Social Media Erupts



Fans were quick to react to the viral selfie. One user tweeted, “Kim calls Aishwarya QUEEN. A crossover we weren’t expecting when we entered 2024.” Another exclaimed, “So this is the multiverse???” 



The excitement didn’t stop there. Another tweet read, “Everyone is fangirling over Kim, and Kim is fangirling over Aishwarya. She is the only Indian celebrity Kim posted on her IG, meaning Kim knew her before. Her popularity and power are unmatched.” 



Celebrities at the Event: A Star-Studded Affair



Besides Aishwarya Rai, Kim Kardashian also posed with other notable figures such as Ranveer Singh and Mahesh Babu’s daughter. This added another layer of excitement and buzz around the event. 



Kim and Khloe’s Indian Adventure



Kim and her sister Khloe Kardashian concluded their visit to India on Sunday morning. They were spotted leaving the Taj Mahal Hotel together, surrounded by a swarm of cameras, indicating they were likely filming their final moments in Mumbai. The sisters had traveled to India specifically to attend Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding. 



Speculations and Future Collaborations



The internet is abuzz with speculations about potential collaborations. One fan tweeted, “Kim and Ranveer romance in a movie or launch a clothing line together, what would you splurge your money on?” The excitement around these potential projects adds to the ongoing buzz created by Kim and Aishwarya’s selfie. 



Conclusion: A Viral Sensation



Kim Kardashian’s selfie with Aishwarya Rai has undeniably become a viral sensation, symbolizing a crossover of Western and Bollywood cultures. The image not only celebrates the beauty and grace of these two stars but also highlights the global influence and admiration they command. As fans continue to share and comment on the viral post, it remains a testament to the power of celebrity and social media in bridging cultural divides.

post.title: Kim Kardashian Quotes Daughter North West, Hours After the Grand $50 Billion Wedding
post.text:
Kim Kardashian is one proud star mama. Her mini-me, North West, may have her own preferences with dad Kanye West now called Ye, and his new wife, Bianca Censori. However, the billionaire mother of four never forgets about her 10-year-old no matter what she does. Be it attending a billion-dollar wedding abroad or launching her next line of products for SKIMS, Kardashian has her daughter by her side all the time. While North West might be busy launching her next song with rapper dad, mom Kim Kardashian has found an excellent way to shout out her daughter.  How did Kim Kardashian cite her daughter?SKIMS owner, Kim Kardashian, a few hours back, shared a snap from the lavish wedding of Indian entrepreneur Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant, estimated to be worth a staggering $50 billion. The reality TV star and beauty mogul who made waves in the fashion world with her alluring Indian ensembles, took to her Instagram handle to post herself pouting for a selfie from the high-profile event, captioning it "blessssss me" with a red heart symbol.  <iframe id="instagramFrame" scrolling="no" style="top: 0; left: 0; bottom: 0; right: 0; height: 420px; border: none;" src="This is nothing but a clear nod to North's debut song, 'Talking' on 'Vultures 1 ' with father Ye and Ty Dolla $ign on it. By using the same phrase, Kim Kardashian evidently celebrated her daughter's creative endeavors, with her massive following. While not many noticed the caption connection, fans who did are gushing over the sweet mother-daughter moment. Read More: “She’s so unserious”- Kim Kardashian Sends the Internet ROFL With This Single Move at Billionaire Heir’s Wedding in IndiaWhile it seems Kardashian felt blessed at the wedding of the century, she and Khloé could not keep up with the regal fashion festival at the Ambanis', but had a great time out with their Indian celebrity friends.  The Kardashian sisters' India rendezvousThe 43-year-old reality star and her sister Khloé, 40, were among the international celebrities who attended the lavish nuptials in Mumbai, India. The ceremony was held at the Jio World Drive. Bringing in their fashion A-game to keep up with their Indian counterparts but still getting outshined by a 27-year-old Indian actress, the star also celebrated meeting with renowned A-listers like Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, the 1994 Miss World winner.  Kim Kardashian took selfie with Aishwarya Rai and calls her "Queen"🔥  Power of our Queen 👑 pic.twitter.com/Sgg7GsmKWZ — journalist R Thakur Bitta katal (@ThakurBitta) July 14, 2024


Kim also has confirmed that the opulent wedding ceremony will be featured on their reality TV show, The Kardashians. Apparently, the sisters were filming for their show when Khloé Kardashian shared a video on social media showing a production crew following them around with cameras, lights, and microphones. She later confirmed this, writing, “And duh we were filming The Kardashians too so you guys can see Kim and Khloe take India (sic)". While the wedding festivities did not see North's presence, Kim ensured that she still gets the shout-out with the caption. post.title: Behind the scenes of billionaire Indian weddings: Hired ‘shadows,’ phone bans, and a circus master to lead the chaos
post.text:
Indian wedding planners said this week’s Ambani wedding is already setting trends. 
Nishita Aggarwal, The Event Designer 
Radhika Merchant and Anant Ambani are slated to get married on Friday in Mumbai.Four Indian event planners shared what it’s like to plan a big celebrity wedding.The Ambani wedding is already setting trends for couples planning their own nuptials. 
The wedding of the year is upon us. 
After rounds of opulent pre-wedding festivities, Radhika Merchant and Anant Ambani, the youngest son of Asia’s richest man, are slated to get married on Friday in Mumbai. 
Their guests, who have so far included Bollywood actors, Indian cricketers, and international business leaders, will also attend events on Saturday and a reception on Sunday. 
During a pre-wedding event in March, Ambani said his mom worked 18 hours a day for the four months leading up to the parties. 
“All this is created by my mother and no one else, and my mother has gone all out for the last four months,” Ambani said, per a video of the speech uploaded in March. 
Planning such an event takes a village, according to four wedding planners who spoke to Business Insider about what goes into organizing a multi-day Indian celebrity wedding. 
The biggest cost is the venue
The planners BI spoke to said a typical multi-day wedding that they plan costs between five to 10 crore Indian Rupees, or about $1.2 million. 
Crore is an Indian term for 10 million; 1 crore rupees is around $120,000. 
Whether it’s a big-ticket wedding like the Ambani’s or the wedding of an upper-middle-class family, the breakdown of major costs in an Indian wedding look about the same, one event planner told BI. 
About 40% to 50% of the budget goes to the venue, which includes catering and rooms for the guests, said Nishita Aggarwal, the founder of The Event Designer, a Mumbai-based wedding planning company. 
Next, 25% to 30% of costs go toward decorations, which include elaborate backdrops, tents, and floor-to-ceiling floral arrangements. 
Decorations involve intricate or themed backdrops for each ceremony. 
Nishita Aggarwal The Event Designer 
About 10% is spent on entertainment. The Ambanis have hired Rihanna, Justin Bieber, Katy Perry, The Backstreet Boys, and Pitbull for pre-wedding functions in recent months. 
Other families spend a lot on artists including singers and celebrity DJs, said Purvi Modgil, a destination wedding planner based in Mumbai. 
“If you plan to call three or four of them in different core functions, that can also add up to a good cost,” she said. 
The remaining 10% usually goes into wedding gifts and logistics for the family and guests. 
“Now, when it comes to a high-net-worth wedding or a celebrity wedding, everything becomes 10 times or hundred times” of that cost, Aggarwal said. “There is no bar on the budget.” 
Planners’ cost estimates of the Ambani wedding varied widely, from tens of millions of dollars to hundreds of millions of dollars. 
Anant’s older sister Isha Ambani got married in 2018 in a similarly lavish wedding, including a Beyoncé performance. While media outlets speculated about a $100 million price tag, a spokesperson for the Ambani-owned company, Reliance, said that it cost less than $15 million, per a Forbes article at the time. 
A spokesperson for the family did not respond to a request for comment about the costs for Anant Ambani’s wedding. 
The pre-wedding events have grabbed headlines for months. With so many celebrities and business leaders angling for an invitation, the nuptials are also a business networking event, Aggarwal said. 
Each main family member is assigned a ‘shadow’
Many couples don’t want to host their weddings at venues where other high-profile families have already held nuptials, Aggarwal said. 
“They want everything to be exclusive,” she said. “The decor has to be something else that no one else has ever thought of. It is almost like a big movie set.” 
For a big celebrity wedding, planners divide their staff into teams and hire hundreds of additional people leading up to and on the day of the ceremony. 
With chefs, waiters, light and audio teams, and decorators, about 500 people often work the event, Modgil said. 
The planners also assign butlers to each main family member. These staffers, called “shadows,” hold their phones and gifts and ensure they stay hydrated and have everything they need. 
“There are over 70 suppliers and vendors who we work with for each wedding,” said Darshan Shroff, a Mumbai-based wedding planner. “I like to describe wedding planners in India as circus masters.” 
Privacy and security are top concerns
Many celebrity or influencer couples are particular about how their wedding is portrayed on the news and on social media. 
Planners have strict instructions that restrict posts from vendors about outfits, decor, or flowers before a set date. Most big weddings also collect the phones of their guests for privacy, and couples have teams that work with the media. 
“You can’t have too many people hanging out taking their pictures. It makes them very uncomfortable,” Modgil said about celebrity guests and couples. 
Top security firms and even local authorities may sketch out safety plans. 
“The minute there are some kind of celebrities, whether it’s politicians or Bollywood, security becomes very important,” Modgil said. “We’ve had separate people escorting them and even taking them back because sometimes they even get mobbed.“ 
The families and their guests are not always easy to please. 
Aggarwal said she has planned weddings where celebrity attendees call to confirm what type of hotel suite they will be staying in and what kind of car is coming to pick them up. Everything must match their lifestyle standard. 
Setting a blueprint for other weddings
The Ambani wedding is already influencing how other Indians are envisioning and planning their own nuptials. 
The planners told BI that brides are asking them for the same designers that Radhika Merchant wore in her pre-wedding events, like the custom lehengas designed by Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla and Tarun Tahiliani. 
Radhika Merchant wore a Swarovski crystal lehenga designed by Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla. 
Ashish Vaishnav via Getty Image 
Planners expect the main wedding to leave an even bigger mark. 
“Given the immense influence celebrities have, their weddings often become blueprints for future celebrations worldwide,” said Bharat Jagasia, a Delhi-based wedding planner. 
“For the Ambani wedding, I am particularly excited to see how they differentiate the main event from their pre-wedding functions,” he said. 
The festivities are slated to kick off Friday at the Jio World Convention Centre, which is owned by the Ambani family. It can accommodate over 16,000 guests. 
Read the original article on Business Insider

post.title: Shipra Khanna - I Learned to Curate Menus Globally, Work With Celebrated Chefs, and Teach at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris (Masterchef Winner)
post.text: "Believe in yourself and your unique voice. Never stop learning and experimenting. Embrace failures as stepping stones to success." 1. Can you share your journey and how your passion for cooking evolved? My journey has been a passionate and resilient one, driven by a commitment to my craft. Growing up, I was fascinated by the diverse flavors and aromas in my kitchen, inspired by my grandmothers' and mothers' traditional recipes. This spark led me to pursue a career in culinary arts, and winning MasterChef India was a pivotal moment that transformed my life. It validated my hard work and reminded me that dreams do come true with dedication, hard work, determination, and perseverance. 2. How did winning MasterChef India impact your career and approach to cooking? Winning MasterChef India was a game-changer, turning my passion into a profession and instilling a sense of responsibility. It gave me a platform to showcase my skills, share my culinary vision, and experiment with global flavors while staying true to my roots. This experience taught me the importance of innovation, creativity, and storytelling in cooking. I learned to curate menus globally, work with celebrated chefs, and teach at Le Cordon Bleu in Paris. 3. You've authored nine cookbooks and hosted various cooking shows. How do you balance creativity and charisma in your work? For me, balance is about authenticity. When writing, I pour my heart into each recipe, drawing inspiration from my experiences, travels, and cultural heritage. On television, I bring that same passion to life, being genuine, enthusiastic, and approachable. It's a dynamic balance of being deeply personal and outwardly expressive, and I find joy in both aspects of my career. 4. What advice would you give to aspiring chefs looking to make a mark in the culinary world? Believe in yourself and your unique voice. Never stop learning and experimenting. Embrace failures as stepping stones to success. Stay humble and grounded, and remember the love for food that brought you into this field. Your passion and authenticity will shine through and help you carve your niche. Always be open to feedback, and never stop innovating and improving. 5. How do you stay inspired and keep your recipes fresh and innovative in the evolving culinary landscape? Are there any emerging food trends that excite you? I stay inspired by embracing curiosity and exploring different cultures through travel. I discover new ingredients, techniques, and flavors, which fuel my creativity and help me keep my recipes fresh and innovative. Currently, I'm excited about sustainable cooking, local and seasonal ingredients, plant-based cuisine, and ancient grains like millets. These trends inspire me to create healthy, delicious, and environmentally conscious recipes. 6. What's your favorite book and why? One of my favorites is "The Alchemist" by Paulo Coelho. It's a beautiful narrative about following your dreams and listening to your heart. The book reminds me that every step in our journey, no matter how challenging, brings us closer to our purpose and dream. It encourages me to stay true to myself and my passion for cooking. Bio: Shipra Khanna is an Indian celebrity chef, restaurateur, author and television personality. She is best known for, at the age of 29,winning the second season of the Indian television show MasterChef India (2012) which aired on Star Plus. Instagram  Interviewed by: Manya  Edited by : Mishika Goel

post.title: 8 Top Food Bloggers in India
post.text:
Top Food Bloggers in India – A food blogger is a person who creates and manages a blog or website dedicated to recipes, restaurants, foods, culinary experiences and special cooking tips. These food bloggers engage with their audience through their blog and social media accounts like youtube, facebook and instagram. 
For the past few years, India has seen an increased growth in culinary trends and food blogging industry. Many food bloggers have emerged and became influential figures. Even many recipes and food related blogs and websites have also increased. 
Here in this post we have listed some of the famous food bloggers in India who have gained audiences with their unique recipes and passion for food. 
Top Food Bloggers in India
Nisha Madhulika
She is a youtube personality, Indian chief and restaurant consultant. Nisha also writes for many food columns in popular newspaper like Amar Ujala, Indian Express, Dainik Bhaskar and Times of India. She basically covers Indian cuisine like north Indian dishes, desserts and veg recipes. 
She also has a youtube channel where she shares easy to follow recipes in Hindi. Till now her youtube channel has 14.3 million subscribers. Nisha Madhulika also comes in the list of Top 10 Food Bloggers in India. 
Nisha Madhulika Blog 
Nisha Madhulika Youtube Channel 
Shivesh Bhatia
Shivesh is a food blogger from Delhi, India who is the founder of ‘Bake with Shivesh’ food blog where he shares some of the finest baking recipes. His blog is dedicated to aspiring bakers and dessert enthusiasts. 
His blog covers a delightful array of cookies, cakes and other baked treats like chocolate cakes, cup cakes, microwave desserts, fruit desserts, chocolate cookies, kaju katli, chocolate burfi, microwave brownie, etc. 
Shivesh Bhatia Blog 
Shivesh Bhatia Youtube Channel 
Sanjeev Kapoor
He is a famous Indian chief, entrepreneur and television presenter. Popularly known as ‘Chef of India’, Sanjeev Kapoor has been a household name for decades. He has received many prestigious awards like Padma Shri, Guinness World Record for cooking 918 kg khichdi live, Indian Television Academy Award for best cookery show Khana Khazana, National Award for Best Chef of India, and many others. 
He shares different kind of recipes in his blog like veg, non veg, Maharashtrian, Gujarati, Punjabi, Indo Chinese, Mexican, Italian, South Indian, Soups, Desserts, Appetizers, etc. Till now his youtube channel has 7.55 million subscribers. 
Sanjeev Kapoor Blog 
Sanjeev Kapoor Youtube Channel 
Archana Doshi
She is the founder of ‘Archana’s Kitchen’. Archana basically writes about home family recipes like vegetarian recipes, street food recipes, biryani recipes, pasta recipes, cup cake recipes, chutney recipes, gravy recipes, Indian sabji recipes, south Indian recipes, baking recipes, meal plans, lunchbox ideas, and many more. 
She also writes about delicious lunchbox ideas covering a well balanced diet and nourishing meals. These lunchbox recipe ideas are the best for school going kids, college going teens and office going professionals. She is also in the list of Top 20 Food Bloggers in India. 
Archana Doshi Blog 
 
Sahi Hai Vlog
If you are a street food lover and want to explore some of the finest north Indian street food recipes live, then you can follow this food youtube channel. The name of the channel is ‘Sahi Hai’ which mostly covers Indian street food. Sahi Hai Vlog is also in the list of Top Food Bloggers in India. 
Here you will find some of the unique street food recipes like Delhi crorepati pizza, fruit chole kulche, illuminati nashta, Punjabi nashta, Chandigarh lunch thali, Haryana tadke wale chole kulche, desi highway food, zero figure paratha, king size Mumbaiya nashta, Punjabi tawa burger, and many more. 
Sahi Hai Youtube Channel 
Aarthi Satheesh
She is a food blogger, recipe creator, food photographer and youtuber. She is the founder of ‘Yummy Tummy Aarthi’. She started this food blog 9 years back to share her personal recipes with her friend and family. Later she turned her part time blog into a full time career. 
In her blog she shares all the recipes with step wise detailed explanation and pictures. Some of her popular recipes you can find in her blog are snacks, dosa, idli, upma, stuffed paratha, paniyaram, appam, vada, chutney, poori, kolukattai, puttu, idiyappam, pancakes, waffles, french toast, muffin recipes, omelette, doughnuts, sandwich, smoothies, oats recipe, juices, shakes, smoothies, lassi, soups, salad, raita, appetizer, and many more. 
Aarthi Satheesh Blog 
Aarthi Satheesh Youtube Channel 
Ranveer Brar
He is an Indian celebrity chef, Masterchef judge, author, actor and restaurateur. He has many restaurants in India and abroad. During his childhood days, he got inspired by local Kebab vendors in Lucknow which later led him to pursue his passion for food. Ranveer is also in the list of Best Food Bloggers in India. 
Ranveer has completed his education from Institute of Hotel Management Lucknow and later joined the Taj Mahal Hotel and began his career. He writes about many recipes in his blog like veg, non veg, monsoon recipes, party snacks, summer recipes, festival recipes, vegan salads, healthy desserts, and many others. Till now he has 7.58 million subscribers in his youtube channel. 
Ranveer Brar Blog 
Ranveer Brar Youtube Channel 
Rajeswari Vijayanand
She is the founder of ‘Raks Kitchen’. She has been blogging since 2007. She mostly writes about south Indian veg recipes. She also writes about north Indian and amazing lunch ideas recipe. In her blog you can find recipes like parathas, roti, idli dosa, chutney, sambar, rasam, kuzhambu, poriyal, kootu, varuval, salad, soup, pickle, oat recipes, millet recipes, and many more.

post.author: NUJS IPTLS
post.title: AI-Generated Impersonations: Violations of Publicity Rights Or Passing Off?
post.text:
The post is authored by A.S. Vamsi Krishna, a 4th year law student at RGNUL, Punjab. 



Introduction



On 15th May 2024, the Delhi HC passed an order in favour of the Indian celebrity Jackie Shroff, protecting his right to publicity against impersonation of his persona (voice, image and likeness) by websites using generative AI programs for marketing, and other commercial usage. This decision represents a paradigm shift in how Indian courts handle copyright infringements where AI is used to replicate the persona of a celebrity without their permission. In past decisions like Anil Kapoor Film Co (P) Ltd v Make My Day Entertainment (Anil Kapoor v Make My Day), Indian courts have categorised violations of a celebrity’s persona as passing off rather than a violation of publicity rights. The difference in treatment is relevant since the categorisation of the infringement determines how the remedy may be availed including the extent of its applicability as well as the requisite evidentiary threshold. In this piece, the author supports the Delhi HC’s decision, contending that the impersonation of a person’s persona (i.e., voice, image or likeness) should be addressed as a violation of their publicity rights, rather than being categorised as passing off. 



The Problem with Categorising AI Generated Impersonations as Passing Off



 



Passing off generally refers to the marketing of a product that is deceptively similar to someone else’s product, causing confusion among consumers. This concept is particularly relevant when the concerned intellectual property is not registered. The judicial categorization of impersonations as passing off stems from this idea, since likeness or voice are inherent traits of a person and not creative works, making them non-registrable under Section 13 of the Copyright Act 1957 (Copyright Act). English courts favour this approach as seen in Sim v H.J. Heinz, where the court noted that using someone’s voice without consent for monetary gain would be considered passing off one’s persona. In Anil Kapoor v Make My Day, the Bombay HC affirmed this approach. The Court held that the impersonation of a celebrity’s image, voice, or likeness for commercial usage would find remedy under passing off. 



However, the categorisation of AI-generated impersonations as passing off would be inappropriate since the rigorous test for proving passing off would severely limit the applicability and efficacy of the remedy. The test for proving passing off requires the fulfilment of three elements– first, goodwill/reputation is associated with the person; second, misrepresentation leading the public to believe the person is associated with the impersonator; third, some form of damage has been inflicted to the person.  This test is known as the classical trinity and is notoriously difficult to prove since the evidential burden of proof is upon the person alleging that the infringement took place. Consequently, the affected person seeking protection would have to go through a laborious litigation process. The difficulty associated in availing the remedy may discourage some, thus reducing the efficacy of the remedy. Further, the ingredient of misrepresentation is particularly problematic, as it significantly limits the availability of remedies. This limitation arises where the impersonator explicitly discloses that the voice was generated by an AI program, it negates the element of misrepresentation. In other words, the impersonator can easily circumvent the misrepresentation element, and thus the passing off claim, by simply adding a disclaimer about the artificial origin of the impersonation. . Nonetheless, this does not diminish the unethical nature of the unauthorised use of their persona. For instance, an AI-generated parody audio that impersonates a person, even with a disclaimer of its artificial origin, still infringes upon the moral rights of the individual. 



The Better Alternative: Publicity Rights



The right of publicity refers to the legal right conferred to individuals which grants them the exclusive authority to authorise or prohibit the use of their persona for commercial purposes. US courts have preferred this approach, as evidenced in White v Samsung Electronics America, where the court held that impersonations of a person’s likeness or voice in commercials violate their publicity rights. The issue of AI-generated impersonation was raised in Main Sequence Ltd. v. Dudesy LLC, where the legal representatives of the late comedian George Carlin sued a podcast company for publishing an AI-generated comedy special featuring Carlin’s persona. Although the parties later settled, leaving the jurisprudence on this topic unclear, the court’s ruling in White v. Samsung clearly indicates that the right of publicity is a valid ground to sue for AI-based impersonations. 



In K.S. Puttaswamy v Union of India, the Indian Supreme Court recognised the right of publicity as a fundamental right and held that any person who has an enforceable right on the persona (either the person or his legal representatives) can prevent unauthorised use of the persona. However, since the case did not actually revolve around the issue of celebrity rights, there is a risk that lower courts may ignore it, considering it to be obiter dictum. Resolving this issue, the Delhi HC in Anil Kapoor v. SimplyLife recognized that infringement of publicity rights constitutes valid grounds for granting an injunction against impersonators using AI-generated images and videos to replicate a celebrity’s persona for marketing their own products. Additionally, the Court differentiated this remedy from passing off by stating that proof of misrepresentation or falsification was not required. Thus, categorising AI-generated impersonations under infringement of publicity rights, rather than passing off, broadens the scope of available remedies by eliminating the need to prove misrepresentation. Additionally, publicity rights encompass more than just reactive measures, as seen in passing off cases where legal action can only be taken post unauthorised use. They also offer proactive protection, granting individuals the authority to control and monetize their identity by licensing it for commercial usage. 



Conclusion 



The Delhi High Court’s decision affirming publicity rights sets an important precedent for addressing copyright infringements involving AI-generated impersonations of individuals in advertisements, chatbots, merchandising, and other deceptive practices. From the discussion above, it is evident that the remedy under publicity rights is preferable to passing off due to its balanced evidentiary threshold, broader applicability, and enhanced rights. A decisive ruling by the apex court in favor of publicity rights would mark a significant milestone in protecting intellectual property against AI exploitation. Furthermore, addressing this issue requires more than just court rulings; governmental action vis-à-vis legislation is essential to provide specific remedies against AI-generated impersonation of persona. States like Tennessee have already enacted regulations, such as the Ensuring Likeness, Voice, and Image Security (ELVIS) Act of 2024 , to address AI-generated impersonations, which allows victims to seek civil remedies, including punitive damages, against offenders who misrepresent their identity using generative AI. Such laws not only serve as ex-post remedies but also deter impersonation by establishing clear legal consequences.

post.title: MG Astor Review: The Quirky SUV with a Techy Twist and a Heart of Gold
post.text:
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, gather ’round for the grand unveiling of the MG Astor – the car that’s here to revolutionize your driving experience and maybe even make you laugh along the way. Picture this: a Chinese SUV strutting down the runway with the confidence of a supermodel and the charm of a stand-up comedian. Yes, folks, it’s the MG ZS Astor! 







A History Lesson (But Fun!)



First hitting the roads in 2017, the Astor has been a crowd-pleaser ever since. Fast forward to 2024, and we’re gazing upon the first-generation facelift variant – think of it as the Astor with a fresh new haircut and a cheeky smile. Exclusively a petrol beast, the range starts at a modest INR 10 lakh (ex-showroom), while the top-of-the-line Savvy Pro model demands a princely sum of INR 17.89 lakh. 







The Electrifying Twin



Did you know the Astor has a sibling with a green thumb? Meet the ZS EV, starting at INR 19 lakh. It’s the environmentally conscious sibling who’s always reminding you to recycle and turn off the lights when you leave the room. 







International Fame



The Astor isn’t just an Indian celebrity; it’s a global sensation! Known as MG ZX, ZST, or VS in various countries, it’s the international equivalent of that friend who has different nicknames in every group. Assembled in India, China, Thailand, Taiwan, and Indonesia, the Astor is a true globetrotter. 



Safety Ratings: Mixed Reviews



Safety-wise, the Astor has been through the wringer. Euro NCAP gave it a “meh” 3 out of 5 stars, while ASEAN NCAP showered it with a perfect 5 out of 5. It’s like that one kid in school who gets a gold star from some teachers and a “needs improvement” from others. 



The ADAS Extravaganza



MG Astor comes with ADAS Level 2, which is a fancy way of saying it has a bunch of features that make you feel like you’re in a sci-fi movie. Lane Departure Warning, Forward Collision Warning, and Automatic Emergency Braking – it’s like having a very cautious and somewhat paranoid co-pilot. 



Variant Bonanza



Astor now comes in five flavors: Sprint, Shine, Select, Sharp Pro, and Savvy Pro. Think of them as ice cream flavors – each one a little different, but all guaranteed to make your drive deliciously smooth. 



Exterior: The Show-Off



With features like fog lamps with cornering function, celestial grille, and automatic full LED hawkeye headlamps, the Astor is basically peacocking on the road. Rain-sensing wipers and power-adjustable, foldable heated mirrors with turn indicators and cameras – it’s like having a tiny butler for your car. 



Size Does Matter



At 4.3 meters in length, 1.8 meters in width, and 1.6 meters in height, the Astor is just the right size to make you feel like a road king without the hassle of parking a tank. 



Wheels and Brakes: Fancy Feet



Riding on 17-inch dual-tone machined alloy wheels (or 16-inch steel wheels if you’re feeling basic), with disc brakes all around, the Astor is ready to dance. Red brake calipers are the cherry on top for those who like a pop of color. It is equipped with 215/55 R17 94V Goodyear Assurance Triplemax 2 radial tubeless tyres.   



Color Me Impressed



Reviewing the Starry Black color, the Astor also comes in white, red, silver, and grey. It’s like choosing your fighter in a video game – each one equally ready to conquer. 



Suspension and Body: Smooth Operator



The Astor boasts McPherson strut suspension in the front and torsion beam suspension in the rear. Coupled with an ultra-high tensile steel cage body, it’s built like a fortress on wheels. 



Rear Bumper and Lights: Bling Bling



A dual exhaust design rear bumper, rear fog lamp, LED tail lamps with Emergency Stop Signal, rear wiper with washer, and defogger – this car is practically screaming, “Look at me!” 



Steering and Safety: The Control Freak



Three steering modes – normal, urban, and dynamic – cater to your every mood. The ADAS Level 2 safety system is like having an overprotective mom who just wants to keep you safe. Six airbags, ABS, EBD, Active Cornering Brake Control, Remote Keyless Entry, Electronic Stability Program, Traction Control System, Hill Hold Control, Hill Descent Control, Tyre Pressure Monitoring System, rear parking sensors, seatbelt reminder, 360 degree camera, Security Alarm, Speed Warning Alert, Central Locking, Speed Sensing Auto Door lock, Child Lock, Impact Sensing Door Unlock, Engine Immobilizer, ISOFIX child seat mounting, and a whole lot more acronyms mean you’re covered from every angle. 



Tech Savvy: The Nerd



With i-Smart 2.0, you can control over 80 features from your smartphone. Digital key sharing, Anti-Theft Immobilisation, live location sharing, tracking, remote car lock/unlock, find my car, geofence, Smart Drive Information, engine start alarm, Vehicle speeding Alert, Vehicle Status Check, tyre pressure voice alert, and even a remote AC on/off feature – it’s like the car that’s smarter than your average teenager. 



Accessories Galore: The Fashionista



door visor, foot step, floor mats, mud flaps, car cover, chrome garnish, spoiler extension, side scoop, hood scoop, illuminated wheel hub, exhaust finisher, body graphics, badges, body side moulding, bull bar, seat cover, scuff plate, key finder, ambient mood lamp, puddle lamp, dash cam and more, the Astor offers more accessories than a high-end fashion boutique. You can pimp this ride to your heart’s content. 



Interior: The Cozy Den



With a 488-litre boot space, 16-inch steel spare wheel, and six speakers, the Astor is ready for road trips. White leatherette upholstery, with options for red and black fabric, gives it a stylish edge. 



Fancy Features: The Showman



Ventilated seats, power-adjustable driver’s seat, tilt steering, dual horn, CVT automatic transmission – the list goes on. Wireless charging, automatic AC, a 10.1-inch HD touchscreen infotainment system with i-Smart 2.0, and a personal AI assistant – it’s like having a mini butler in your car. 



The Heartbeat: The Engine



Two engine options: a 1498 cc inline 4-cylinder VTi-Tech petrol engine with 108 horsepower and a 1349 cc inline 3-cylinder 220Turbo petrol engine with 138 horsepower. Both offer decent fuel efficiency and enough power to keep your drive thrilling. 



Final Verdict: The Stand-Up SUV



The MG Astor is like that charming friend who’s always cracking jokes and making everyone laugh. It’s packed with features, oozes style, and offers a driving experience that’s both safe and fun. Whether you’re in it for the tech, the safety, or just the sheer joy of driving something that feels like a high-tech chariot, the Astor is ready to be your new best friend on wheels. 




        View this post on Instagram            A post shared by NamasteCar (@namastecar) 







The post MG Astor Review: The Quirky SUV with a Techy Twist and a Heart of Gold appeared first on NamasteCar.

post.title: Sonam Kapoor Heads to Paris for Dior Haute Couture Show 2024
post.text:
Sonam Kapoor, the last word for fashion in India, is heading to Paris to attend the Dior’s Haute Couture Fall/Winter Show set to take place on June 24th. Sonam is the only Indian celebrity to have been invited to this prestigious event that will attract the biggest names in fashion from across the world. 
Sonam, who is widely regarded by the media as a global fashion icon and India’s cultural ambassador to the West, will witness the super luxury fashion house, Dior, unveil its latest couture masterpieces. 
 
Sonam Kapoor's Global Impact: From Cannes to Tate Modern Committee
Sonam has captivated global audiences with her chic appearances at marquee international events like Paris Fashion Week, King Charles' Coronation, the India-UK reception hosted by UK PM Rishi Sunak, and the Cannes Film Festival, where she was the first Indian actress to grace the French Riviera. She has also become the sole Indian actor to be on the South Asia Acquisition Committee of the prestigious Tate Modern Museum. 
 
At many major global fashion events, Sonam has made it a point to represent India and the incredible Indian craftsmanship. She has single-handedly brought fashion into focus in India. Recently, according to a global fashion report, Sonam was amongst the list of celebrities like Zendaya, Kylie Jenner, Kendall Jenner, Blackpink, BTS, etc who had the highest impact for luxury fashion brands in 2023! 
On the work front, Sonam is gearing up for two tent pole projects, details of which are set to be announced in the coming months.

post.title: Alia, Deepika and Kiara become the top three Bollywood actresses in India’s most valuable celebrities list!
post.text:
A new report by financial and risk advisory firm Kroll reveals a shakeup in the top ranks of India’s most valuable celebrities. #AliaBhatt, #DeepikaPadukone and #KiaraAdvani become the top three actresses to make their mark in India’s most valuable celebrities list 2023. 
The report, titled “Celebrity Brand Valuation Report 2023: Brands, Business, Bollywood” shows Alia Bhatt at number five with a brand value of $101.1 million, and Deepika Padukone at number six with $96 million. Both actresses saw slight dips from their 2022 rankings. 
The biggest story, however, is Kiara Advani, who was ranked 16th in 2022, skyrocketed to 12th in 2023 with a brand value of $60 million. This impressive rise highlights her growing influence in the Indian market. 
The report also delves into celebrity endorsement trends. It found that the top 25 celebrities endorsed over 300 brands across various sectors in the past year, with a significant increase in both TV and digital endorsements. This suggests a growing role for celebrities in shaping consumer choices. Overall, the Kroll report paints a picture of a dynamic Indian celebrity landscape, with established stars like Alia Bhatt, Deepika Padukone and Kiara Advani making their mark.

post.author: IQnewswire
post.title: The Impact of Celebrity Endorsements in Advertising
post.text:
In the dynamic landscape of Indian advertising, celebrity endorsements stand as beacons of influence, guiding brand narratives and captivating audiences nationwide. From iconic actors to sporting legends, Indian celebrities wield significant power in shaping consumer perceptions and driving brand engagement. Let’s delve into the world of Indian celebrity ads and explore how these influential figures leave an enduring mark on marketing campaigns. 
Indian celebrity ads are more than just promotional tools; they are powerful storytelling vehicles. Whether it’s the charisma of Amitabh Bachchan or the elegance of Deepika Padukone, these ads weave narratives that resonate deeply with audiences. By blending star power with relatable storytelling, brands create emotional connections that resonate long after the ad ends. 
The allure of Indian celebrity ads lies in their ability to tap into cultural nuances and societal trends. From traditional festivals to modern lifestyles, these ads reflect the rich tapestry of Indian life. By aligning with cultural moments and values, brands position themselves as integral parts of consumers’ daily experiences, fostering trust and loyalty. 
Furthermore, Indian celebrity ads often serve as aspirational symbols for viewers. Whether it’s Ranveer Singh endorsing a fashion brand or PV Sindhu promoting a sports equipment line, these ads evoke desires for success, style, and achievement. Aspirational numbers help brands connect with consumers’ aspirations and increase their appeal. 
However, credibility and genuineness are essential for Indian celebrity advertisements to succeed. Audiences now expect brands to be transparent and to build real relationships with them in an era of increased consumer knowledge. Therefore, in order to ensure authenticity and resonance with their target audience, brands need to carefully choose superstars whose values match their own. 
There are risks associated with Indian celebrity commercials, even with their huge appeal. Celebrities are not immune to controversies, and any misstep can damage a brand’s reputation. Therefore, brands must conduct thorough due diligence and choose celebrities who are not only influential but also reliable and trustworthy partners. 
In summary, Indian celebrity ads represent a potent force in advertising, blending star power with relatable storytelling to create impactful campaigns. By tapping into cultural nuances, evoking aspirations, and prioritizing authenticity, brands can leverage the influence of Indian celebrities to forge deep connections with audiences. With the right approach, Indian celebrity ads have the potential to captivate hearts and minds, leaving a lasting impression that extends far beyond the screen. 
  
The post The Impact of Celebrity Endorsements in Advertising appeared first on Abusinessventure.

post.text:
The premium Scotch Whisky brand by Sanjay Dutt and Cartel Bros unfolds a new chapter with its stellar debut in Goa. After winning the hearts of people across India and its recent launch in the Middle East, the brand The Glenwalk is now available at all alcohol retail outlets across Goa, including duty-free shops at Adani Airport; states a press release.  



Since its launch in June 2023, The Glenwalk Scotch Whisky has been rewriting the rules of the Indian whisky market with its meteoric rise in demand and strategic pricing. The sought-after whisky The Glenwalk has garnered praise, winning not just people’s hearts but awards and accolades, including a Gold Medal at ProWine 2023 within the first year itself, a Silver Medal at the 2024 London Spirits Competition, and a Silver Medal at the IWSC 2024, underscoring its superior quality and exceptional taste. 



The Glenwalk has leveraged the expertise of Cartel Bros’ spearheaded by co-founders Mokksh Sani, Jitin Merani, Rohan Nihalani, Manish Sani, and their Chief Business Officer Neeraj Singh to achieve this phenomenal success. Within a year, The Glenwalk has already left its mark in the Middle Eastern market and successfully expanded to Six Indian states, securing partnerships with over 30 distributors  and with a core team of over 50 people noteworthy achievement for a new entrant in the AlcoBev sector. 



“The introduction of Glenwalk in Goa is a pivotal moment for Cartel Bros,” saidMokksh Sani, Founder of Living Liquidz and Mansionz, and co-founder of Glenwalk. “We aim to establish The Glenwalk as a favourite among whisky aficionados in Goa and strive to expand even further. Goa’s vibrant market offers the perfect landscape to achieve this goal.” 



The Glenwalk’s rapid rise in popularity across India is a testament to its exceptional quality and the strategic vision of its team. Bollywood superstar Sanjay Dutt, celebrity brand ambassador of The Glenwalk, has played a crucial role in the brand’s swift success and expansion. His dedication to excellence has helped Glenwalk build a strong reputation as a premium whisky brand. 



“Goa holds a special place in my heart, and I am thrilled to introduce The Glenwalk to this lively market,” said Sanjay Dutt. “The Glenwalk’s unique blend has been crafted to cater to the refined tastes of whisky enthusiasts and take the Goa party scenes to the next level. I am confident it will be warmly received here.” 



 With its attractive price point and wide availability, The Glenwalk is poised to make a significant impact in Goa’s spirits market. As the first Indian celebrity-owned alcohol brand, The Glenwalk blends tradition with innovation, offering a premium Scotch whisky experience, and is poised to become a global phenomenon in the spirits market. The recent Goa launch is part of Cartel Bros’ broader strategy to expand its footprint across India and into international territories. 
The post SANJAY DUTT’S ‘THE GLENWALK’ LAUNCHED IN GOA appeared first on News for Positivity! | Latest English And Konkani News | Live News Goa TV | Goa's First & Only Positive News Channel.
